channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Instacart boss Fidji Simo was the first member of her family to graduate from high school. Sam Altman just carved out a brand-new ‘CEO’ role for her at OpenAI
item.description: Simo told Fortune the U.S. healthcare system is not well-suited to treat rare and complex diseases, which is where AI can make an impact.

item.title: China’s six-year-olds are being offered AI classes in school—and now 250 CEOs want the lessons to come to America
item.description: The CEOs of Microsoft, Airbnb, and Uber are among over 250 business leaders who are demanding computer science and AI education for all students: "We ...

item.title: REI’s new CEO has a plan to turn around the beloved retailer—by going back to its roots
item.description: CEO Mary Beth Laughton has to simultaneously firm up REI's earthy cred and raise its retail game in a competitive landscape.

item.title: Florida leads the nation in identity theft reports
item.description: Overall ID theft was up 9% nationwide.

item.title: As AI infrastructure booms in Phoenix, Arizona’s Route 66 towns offer a sharp lesson in tech disruption—and survival
item.description: As Phoenix bets big on AI with TSMC's new semiconductor fabrication factories, Arizona’s Route 66 towns reveal what it takes to survive technological ...

item.title: Boeing, Disney and Goldman Sachs lead way as Dow runs day’s gain to 625 points
